title: The Easy Way To Stop Smoking
description:
I was a smoker of at least a pack a day for 4 years, up to 2 packs a day for a 9 month period. A close friend was able to quit using this method and recommended it to me and I can tell you from personal experience that it works. 
Not only does it work, but it does not exaggerate the ease and pleasure of the method at all. 
I went, quite literally, from smoking an entire pack of cigarettes one day, to being a happy non-smoker the next. No urges to fight, no serious withdrawal symptoms and no frustration issues.

If you smoke and would like to stop, do not try any other method, this works!
Only recommendations I would make is to give the tapes your full attention as you listen to them and to follow the instructions fully.

Don't hesitate, it will be the easiest thing you've ever done, and you won't miss them at all.

A quote from Allen Carr's website.
"Since 1983 an estimated 10m smokers just like you have quit smoking using Allen Carrs unique Easyway method. If you want to become a non-smoker with absolutely no desire to smoke, rather than an ex-smoker with constant cravings, then you are in the right place."
